AlberdiLab at the University of Copenhagen Chapter 1 Introduction

AlberdiLab at the University of Copenhagen 2024-04-18 Chapter 1 Introduction AlberdiLab is a research group at the University of Copenhagen focused on studying ecological and evolutionary implications of animal-microbiota interactions. The group is led by Associate Professor Antton Alberdi, and comprises over 20 researchers from all over the world.
